description:
What's the real-time web? Can I build it myself? In Python? Of course
you can! This talk will help Python web developers learn how to
integrate real-time components with their existing web applications
using ``asyncio`` and ``aiohttp``.

Steven Seguin Bio
-----------------

Full-stack developer at SurveyMonkey in Ottawa working on real-time and
collaboration features. Holds strong opinions about distributed systems,
functional programming, and API design.
title: Building the Real-time Web with Python and aiohttp
